sense.def:
Izraz
nearly
pomeni ne popolnoma ali ne čisto natančno.

seg.quote: I can nearly swim a mile.
She was nearly as tall as he was.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
not nearly
poudarimo, da nekaj ni tako. Na primer, če je nekaj
not nearly big enough
, je veliko premajhno.

seg.quote: I haven't spent nearly long enough here.
They don't have nearly so many foods to choose from as we do.
